products.title: Luxury Memory Foam Pillow
products.shortDescription: Ergonomic memory foam pillow for optimal neck support
products.longDescription: Experience ultimate comfort with our premium memory foam pillow. Designed to provide perfect neck and head support while maintaining optimal spinal alignment. The breathable cotton cover ensures a cool and comfortable sleep.

products.title: Premium Sofa Cover - 3 Seater
products.shortDescription: Luxurious sofa cover with water-resistant fabric
products.longDescription: Protect your sofa in style with our premium water-resistant cover. Made from durable yet elegant fabric, this cover offers both protection and aesthetic appeal. Easy to clean and maintain.

products.title: Silk Pillow Cover Set
products.shortDescription: Set of 2 luxurious silk pillow covers
products.longDescription: Transform your bedroom with our premium silk pillow covers. Made from 100% pure mulberry silk, these covers are gentle on your skin and hair. Each set includes two standard-size pillow covers.

products.title: Premium Bed Cover - King Size
products.shortDescription: Elegant bed cover with intricate detailing
products.longDescription: Add a touch of luxury to your bedroom with our premium king-size bed cover. Features beautiful hand-stitched details and is made from high-quality cotton. Perfect for both protection and decoration.

products.title: Velvet Table Cover
products.shortDescription: Luxurious velvet table cover with elegant finish
products.longDescription: Dress your table in luxury with our premium velvet table cover. The rich texture and deep colors create an sophisticated dining atmosphere. Stain-resistant and easy to clean.
